courses.description:
IUCD-GE 3000

   Inter-University Doctoral Consortium

The consortium exists to facilitate doctoral students' taking needed coursework at one or several of participating institutions. It is for course-taking only. It does not arrange or sanction dissertation research and/or faculty consultation at member institutions. The consortium provides for cross-registra­tion among member institutions. City University of New York Graduate Center (CUNY), Columbia University (including Teachers College), Fordham University, New School University,  Princeton University, Rutgers–New Brunswick (State University of New Jersey), and Stony Brook (State University of...

The consortium exists to facilitate doctoral students' taking needed coursework at one or several of participating institutions. It is for course-taking only. It does not arrange or sanction dissertation research and/or faculty consultation at member institutions. The consortium provides for cross-registra­tion among member institutions. City University of New York Graduate Center (CUNY), Columbia University (including Teachers College), Fordham University, New School University,  Princeton University, Rutgers–New Brunswick (State University of New Jersey), and Stony Brook (State University of New York).
